name: The Trial [alpha2.0]
description:
The Trial in its second Alpha. Slowly moving along, this game now has jump movement and actual platforms you can progress through. Although, we do not have enemies, collectables or any music (we will see if we'll have any in the future).

Controls:

Jump - W [KEY] / UP ARROW [KEY]

Move Right - D [KEY] / RIGHT ARROW [KEY]

Move Left - A [KEY] / LEFT ARROW [KEY]

Hint: 

Can't see where you're going? Just Jump

Can't move? Just Jump

Bug(s):

- Collisions on slopes  causes players to be stuck and walls cause player to be stuck if movement keys are held down

- No death event for falling off map, please refresh for the time being
